content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position (-4.5, 24.0)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 24.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when attempting to remove pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group you are trying to remove exists at the specified position before attempting to pick it up. 

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Check for placement blockages when trying to connect pipes. Ensure that there are no other entities obstructing the connection between the boiler and steam engine.
